features.featureTitle: In `frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelopeScene.tsx`, locate the Screen 1 envelope overlay block marked `/* Content */` (currently rendering only the "Hey Love" heading and the "14.02.2026" date) and replace it with the user-provided version that: (1) adds `text-center`, `space-y-3`, and `z-10` to the container, (2) removes the `mb-2` class from the heading, and (3) inserts a centered circular gradient heart icon block between the heading and the date using `<Heart className="text-white" size={30} fill="currentColor" />`.
